headline: M&A Frenzy Reshapes U.S. Oil Patch Into 40 Power Players
summary: U.S. upstream M&A jumped 331% to $206.6B, shrinking the top public E&Ps from 50 to 40.

headline: ConocoPhillips: Load Up While The Market Ignores (Rating Upgrade)
summary: ConocoPhillips stock is undervalued despite strong LNG strategies, synergies from Marathon Oil integration, and an improved outlook. Learn more on COP stock here.
